channel.title: 474 cache
channel.description:
Currently my client is loading on a 474 cache but, i'd really like to make a 459 gameframe.
It has the options to do different gameframes, but when I change it in my client like so,
[code]is459 = false, is474 = true, is480 = false, is508 = false, is525 = false,[/code]
[code] is459 = true, is474 = false, is480 = false, is508 = false, is525 = false,[/code]
the sprites fuck up and look like this
[IMG]http://i233.photobucket.com/albums/ee303/magiklyfe/Untitled-17.png[/img]
Also, I cant find out where to edit my background/titlebox & buttons, i've searched everywhere in the cache files but there is not one picture that matches the one that my client has

item.title: 474 cache

It has the options to do different gameframes, but when I change it in my client like so,
